sentence: Burgess Everett and Holly Otterbein report that Pennsylvanias JOHN FETTERMAN, North Carolinas CHERI BEASLEY, Wisconsins SARAH GODLEWSKI, ALEX LASRY and MANDELA BARNES, and Florida Rep. VAL DEMINGS disagree with the administrations handling of the change or oppose it outright.
title: POLITICO Playbook: White House wonders: To mask, or not to mask?
